txt.en:
'As you may or may not be aware, a party of visitors from far away lands is preparing to depart. Some of them are of high name, and it is meet that they set forth with all of the provisions they need.

'For that reason, I would have you hunt the bears of the High Moor and bring me their pelts. These will make warm blankets and coverings for the travellers.

'Will you aid me with this?'
Collect bear-pelts on the High Moor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected bear-pelts on the High Moor ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The Elf-scout Canaddal is concerned with outfitting and provisioning a party of visitors to Rivendell as they prepare to depart.
Bears can be found throughout the High Moor, in the Trollshaws.\n\nCanaddal has asked you to hunt bears for their pelts.
'Ah, thank you, [placeholder]! These will do nicely.'
'Have you brought the pelts I requested?'
Canaddal is posted at the head of the path leading down to the Bruinen Gorges from the High Moor.\n\nYou should bring the bear-pelts you collected to Canaddal.
